hero.subtitle: Florals • Event Decor • Custom Tailoring & Precision
hero.description: Every detail designed with intention for life's most important moments. From intimate gatherings to grand celebrations, we bring your vision to life with artistry, expertise, and precision.

about.name: JLynne Huffer
about.title: Founder & Creative Director
about.bio: A multidisciplinary creative professional with over 15 years of experience spanning fashion design, event decor, and floral artistry. From the runways of New York Fashion Week to luxury events in Denver and now Sarasota, I bring a unique perspective that blends artistic vision with technical expertise. My background combines couture-level tailoring with innovative event design and botanical artistry—three disciplines that allow me to create truly cohesive, unforgettable experiences.

faq.question: How far in advance should I book your services?
faq.answer: For weddings and large events, we recommend booking 6-12 months in advance to ensure availability and allow time for detailed planning. Smaller events can often be accommodated with 2-4 weeks notice, depending on availability. For alterations and custom tailoring, we can often accommodate rush services for an additional fee.

faq.question: Do you offer consultations?
faq.answer: Yes! We offer complimentary initial consultations (30 minutes via phone or video) to discuss your vision and determine if we're the right fit for your project. For in-depth planning sessions, we charge a consultation fee that's credited toward your final project.

faq.question: What areas do you serve?
faq.answer: We're based in Sarasota and serve the surrounding areas including Bradenton, Venice, Lakewood Ranch, and beyond. Travel fees may apply for distant locations (typically $50-200 depending on distance). We also travel nationally for weddings and large events.

faq.question: Can I combine multiple services?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Our unique triple-service model means you can have coordinated florals, decor, and tailoring from one creative vision. We offer special package pricing for combined services. This ensures complete cohesion across all elements of your event.

faq.question: What is your cancellation policy?
faq.answer: Cancellations more than 60 days before an event receive a full refund (minus any non-refundable vendor fees). Cancellations 30-60 days prior incur a 25% cancellation fee. Cancellations within 30 days are non-refundable. Deposits are always non-refundable. We offer event date changes for a small fee.

faq.question: Do you work with specific vendors or venues?
faq.answer: We've established relationships with most major venues in the area and work seamlessly with photographers, caterers, planners, and other vendors. We can recommend trusted partners or work with your existing team. We're experienced in venue logistics and coordinate all deliveries and setup.

faq.question: How do you handle custom colors or themes?
faq.answer: Custom color palettes and themes are our specialty! During consultation, we discuss your vision, aesthetic preferences, and practical considerations. We provide mood boards, fabric swatches, and color samples. Our design process ensures your vision is perfectly executed across all elements.

faq.question: What's included in your day-of coordination?
faq.answer: Day-of coordination includes final setup, timing management, vendor coordination, quality checks, troubleshooting, and on-site adjustments. Our team manages all logistics so you can enjoy your event worry-free. We're available for the full duration of your event.

credentials.detail: Bachelor of Fine Arts in Fashion Design

casestudies.title: Luxury Beach Wedding Transformation
casestudies.challenge: Client wanted an elegant, romantic beach wedding that would transport 150 guests to a garden paradise despite the sandy venue.
casestudies.solution: Created an elaborate floral installation arch, custom furniture arrangement, and lighting design that transformed the beach into an enchanted garden. Coordinated weather contingencies and setup logistics.
casestudies.results: Guests raved about the transformation. Featured in 3 wedding publications. Client rated 10/10.
casestudies.testimonial: JLynne created something truly magical. The beach was transformed into our dream venue.

casestudies.title: $500K Corporate Gala Execution
casestudies.challenge: Design and execute a high-stakes fundraiser for 400 guests with a $500K budget and strict brand compliance requirements.
casestudies.solution: Coordinated complete venue transformation with 8-person team, managed 15+ vendors, designed 3-tiered floral installations, and executed real-time adjustments.
casestudies.results: Event raised $1.2M. CEO requested JLC Studio for future events. Media coverage in 5 publications.
casestudies.testimonial: JLC Studio didn't just deliver an event—they delivered an experience that will be remembered for years.

casestudies.title: Complete Bridal Vision: Dress + Ceremony + Reception
casestudies.challenge: Bride wanted perfect coordination across custom wedding dress design, ceremony florals, and reception decor all reflecting her unique vision.
casestudies.solution: Created custom mermaid gown with hand-beaded details, designed coordinating floral installations, and styled complete reception aesthetic.
casestudies.results: Bride's vision brought to life perfectly. Wedding featured in Coastal Celebrations magazine. Client became brand ambassador, referred 5 new clients.
casestudies.testimonial: JLynne made me feel like the most beautiful bride. Everything was perfect from dress to decor.
